title: Maybe Yours
description:
Working together is more fun when you’re falling in love...
What do a dating app and co-workers have in common? Other than being a terrible idea...nothing! Internet dating is not for the faint of heart and neither is finding out you're accidently dating your co-worker. At least that’s what Tommy Andrews discovers when he realizes the woman he’s been talking dirty to online is none other than Penny Cartwright, his much younger co-worker who runs the tasting room at Somerville Winery and Vineyard.But Penny is determined to prove that just because she’s younger, it doesn’t mean she doesn’t know what she wants. And what she wants is Tommy.As their chemistry sizzles, denying their attraction to each other proves more difficult than keeping it a secret from their bosses. And you know what they say about dating your co-worker...
author: Claire Raye
